caption.title: Quantitative accumulation of DVGs in recombinant virus-infected cells.
caption.p: Cultured human lung epithelial cells (A549) were infected with indicated mutant viruses stocks at moi 1. Intracellular accumulation of DVGs was determined at indicated hours post-infection (hpi) as the ratio between DVGs and full length viral genomes (as shown in Fig 6). Error bars indicate mean Â± SD of three independent experiments (*p<0.05, **p<0.01, ***p<0.001 by two-way ANOVA with Bonferroni post hoc test).
